title: Heterogeneous ozonolysis of alkyl substituted-polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (AlkPAHs) in the atmosphere
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,645-654
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00024B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vera Zaherddine, Elisabeth Galarneau, Arthur W. H. Chan
Heterogeneous oxidation of alkylated polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (alkPAHs) by ozone is more rapid than their parent analogs (PAHs) and can produce a large variety of potentially toxic oxidation products.
